## Assistant.withChannels() method

Supply the assistant with channels for use at runtime.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
withChannels(channels: Channel[]): Assistant;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  channels | [Channel](./stentor-models.channel.md)<!-- -->\[\] | An array of channels the assistant supports |
